name: Fangjiapan Coal Mine

Fangjiapan Coal Mine is an underground and open-pit mine located in Yuyang District, Yulin City, Shaanxi Province, with a construction scale of 1.2 million tons per year

operators: Yulin Yuyang Fangjiapan Coal Industry Company
